name: Accutech Home Inspections
description:
Buying a home is an extraordinary investment. So why would you want merely an ordinary inspection? Accutech Home Inspections goes far beyond the ordinary, utilizing cutting-edge technologies - including Infrared Scanning, Acoustic (Listening) Sensors and Pattern Recognition Software - that enable our inspectors to "SEE" and "HEAR" into the walls, floors and ceilings of the property.
In addition to a thorough visual inspection, Accutech’s infrared scan often will uncover “hidden” signs of damage and potential problems that might otherwise go undetected in an “ordinary” inspection. And our acoustic scan and specialized software can, under specific conditions, actually hear termites in the property’s walls

More Vein Treatment and Surgery
description:
Vein Experts is an organization of surgically trained specialists with additional expertise in treating venous disease (Varicose veins and Spider veins). 

Many of our physicians are nationally and internationally renowned in the field of venous treatment. Publications ranging from tissue effects of laser vein removal to sclerotherapy have been written by many of our surgeons. Almost all of the ongoing conferences on venous disease are taught by members of Vein Affiliates.


	Patients seeking information on varicose veins, spider veins, venous ulcers and other venous diseases will find detailed descriptions, symptoms and treatment options in our Patient Resources section very useful. If they have a question, they can even ask Dr. Ronald Bush, one of the top rated venous professionals in the world.
	Physicians seeking the latest methods of varicose vein and spider vein treatment, newest technologies and best educational tools in an online community will find our blogs, educational content and equipment descriptions very informative and helpful.
	By informing both patients and physicians, we hope to match every patient with the physician that will provide the patient with the best care possible.
